eGifts.altText: Happy Thanksgiving is written in dark red wavy letters against a sage green background and surrounded by a variety of vegetables
Happy Birthday is written on a vibrant pink and red birthday cake with candles sitting on a green party table.
Thankful for you is written across a dark yellow background with leaves, apples, and other fall icons surrounding it.
A gold card with ornate linework arching over two witches on either side with the words Together We’re Unlimited in a banner at the top and Wicked written in the center.
A silhouette  of Glinda from the musical Wicked is portrayed in pinks against a purple background and surrounded by bubbles with the Wicked title at the bottom.
A silhouette  of Elphaba from the musical Wicked is portrayed in dark greens holding a broom stick against a circular window with the Wicked title at the bottom.
A red Starbucks cup and an iced beverage cheers in the center of a blue background with Season’s Treatings written in green arched between the cups.
Happy Birthday is written in dark green block letters against an off-white background and surrounded by multi-colored balloons, candles and confetti.

The words You’re Best are written in white block letters at the top and bottom of this card, with the word “Just” written in white outline centered between You’re and Best on a red background with white stars and paint splatters.
A rainbow stretches across with a white cloud at each end against a green background, with the words Sending Good Vibes under the rainbow.
On a festive green background that looks like a wrapped gift, the words Thank You are written in blue on a white gift tag attached to a red bow.
Three hands holding Starbucks beverage cups meet in the center toasting each other, set against a light green background covered in strands of red, white and green holiday garland.
Two hands meet in a high five against a background with Great Work arched over the top of the hands and Deserves Coffee across the bottom.
On a red background are multi-colored wrapped gifts with bows and the center green gift has Starbucks written at an angle in white.
Happy Thanksgiving is written in dark red wavy letters against a sage green background and surrounded by a variety of vegetables

La scène de cette carte est une vue en plongée d’une table dressée pour les Fêtes. Sur la table se trouvent quatre assiettes, ainsi que des bols de service et une tarte au centre, avec des mains tendues pour se servir.
Thankful for you is written across a dark yellow background with leaves, apples, and other fall icons surrounding it.
A gold card with ornate linework arching over two witches on either side with the words Together We’re Unlimited in a banner at the top and Wicked written in the center.
A silhouette  of Glinda from the musical Wicked is portrayed in pinks against a purple background and surrounded by bubbles with the Wicked title at the bottom.
A silhouette  of Elphaba from the musical Wicked is portrayed in dark greens holding a broom stick against a circular window with the Wicked title at the bottom.
You Defy Gravity is written in bright green letters on a pink and green background of clouds with Wicked titled at the bottom.
The Emerald City from the musical Wicked is portrayed against a blue cloudy background with the Wicked title at the bottom.
Happy Birthday is written on a vibrant pink and red birthday cake with candles sitting on a green party table.
Happy Birthday is written in dark green block letters against an off-white background and surrounded by multi-colored balloons, candles and confetti.
A bright pink frosted cake sits on a white plate, with lit candles on top and one piece missing, with the words Happy Birthday written in white lettering across the size of the cake.
Mirror ball with blue, green and purple squares hangs in the center of this card against a dark blue background.
On a festive green background that looks like a wrapped gift, the words Thank You are written in blue on a white gift tag attached to a red bow.
Thankful for you is written across a dark yellow background with leaves, apples, and other fall icons surrounding it.
A hand extends from the right holding a steaming Starbucks beverage, with My Treat written in green letters above it against a shaded green and white background.
Thank You is written in bold white letters against a gold background surrounded by sparkles and stars and framed by a bright pink border.
A Big Thank You with the words A Big written in small pale blue letters and arched over the top of the larger words Thank You.
Three hands holding Starbucks beverage cups meet in the center toasting each other, set against a light green background covered in strands of red, white and green holiday garland.
Woo Hoo is written in blue across a silver disco ball with multi-colored sparkles.
Awwwww Yea is written in wavy green letters across a star exploding from the center of the card against a light pink background and surrounded by stars and flowers.
A Starbucks cup is falling on its side, spilling out multi-colored confetti against a light green speckled background.
Happy Holidays is written in white and wrapped in multi-colored string lights on a blended background of green, blue and dark pink.
In a snow globe surrounded in snow, snowman with a maroon hat and pink scarf is giving a red cardinal a green wrapped gift.
A hot beverage with whipped cream and an iced beverage cheers in the center of a swirled green background with Sip the Season written in white.
A jovial gingerbread person wearing a red stripped scarf carrying gingerbread presents while walking on a pink road.
A snowman with black sunglasses and a Starbucks frappuccino and a red cardinal sit on a tropical background of palm trees and red rolling hills in the background.
A red Starbucks cup and an iced beverage cheers in the center of a blue background with Season’s Treatings written in green arched between the cups.
Two Starbucks red cups hang in the center of a green wreath on a snowy, blue background.

The torso of a person wearing a green holiday sweater is centered against a light blue background, with two mittened hands holding a Starbucks beverage cup and That Festive Feeling written in wavy block letters across the bottom.
A cute penguin wearing red earmuffs and a red and white striped scarf sits on snow next to an open hole in the snow holding a fishing pole with a red Starbucks cup dangling from the end.
You're Tree-mendous iis written n red block letters, centered on a light blue sky background surrounded by white stars above an assortment of holiday trees decorated with ribbons, dots and stars.

The words You’re Best are written in white block letters at the top and bottom of this card, with the word “Just” written in white outline centered between You’re and Best on a red background with white stars and paint splatters.
A large wide multi-colored ball ornament with the words You Are So Appreciated written in white and yellow letters stacked in the middle of it is centered against a bright green background.
The words For All You Do are written inside individual shapes centered against a dark orange background surrounded by multi-colored stars.
You're A Star is written in white arched above a decorated tree with a star op top on a red gradient background.
A rainbow stretches across with a white cloud at each end against a green background, with the words Sending Good Vibes under the rainbow.
Make Today A You Day is written in bold yellow letters against a dark green background and surrounded by Starbucks treats and beverages.
You Got This is written in wavy orange letters and centered against a background of puffy white clouds in a light blue sky.
Two hands hold a cup with steam in the shape of hearts with You Warm My Heart written in pink letters on either side of the cup.
You’re Amazing is written in bright green letters across a dark blue and green patterned background and surrounded by pink stars.
A bouquet of multi colored flowers sits in a blue vase on a green table against a light blue background, with Thinkin of Ya written in wavy green letters next to it.

Letters designed to look like wrapped holiday packages spell out M-V-P across the center of the card against a blue and white background with white stars and word Holiday written in small letters arched over the M and V.
Two hands meet in a high five against a background with Great Work arched over the top of the hands and Deserves Coffee across the bottom.
Above plus Beyond equals You is written in green letters across a wavy background texture of purple, blue, green, and yellow background with a few white stars.
Set against a sparkle light blue background, In white font is "Your Hard Work" and in green script Noticed is in the bottom left corner.
On a red background are multi-colored wrapped gifts with bows and the center green gift has Starbucks written at an angle in white.
On a swirled background of red, pink, and green sits a the dark green Starbucks Siren logo.
A close up of a white Siren covers the left half of this Starbucks green card.
Three Starbucks Siren logos are shown, including the brown Siren, the black and white Siren and the free-floating Siren.

details.name: Caffè Americano
details.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.
